channel.title: Client Sounds?
channel.description:
Crap, i hope this is the right section...
Okay, i've downloaded a new source, old one sucked kinda, and this one has an client. Great. But when i click on the prayer icons in my prayer book, it gives me this sweet sounds, absolutely great(thanks gnarly) But here's the point: in the batch it says [b]wave /foldername/sound1.wav[/b] right? okay, all fine, but where in the files can i find the stuff that if an button is pressed a sound appears(alot of files, to lazy to search them ALL), becouse it would be really cool if my whip has the real whip sound <3 Could anybody help with this? Hope you can.
- Dwarf.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 22, 2008, 03:45:37 am[/size][hr]BUMP
